title: The Sound of Home
description: One steamy summer night. One unforgivable betrayal. Two lives forever changed.Em MacCaslin isn’t an ordinary teenager. She’s a world-renowned violinist—until the night she endures a life-altering injury and loses the ability to play.A night she can’t remember.After twelve years of running from the past, she’s back in Langley Park, and she’s looking for answers.Sparks fly and passions ignite when the man she blames for her misfortune insists on helping her uncover the buried secrets surrounding her injury.But not everyone wants Em to learn the truth. A truth with the potential to kill.The Sound of Home is a sexy standalone romance in the Langley Park Series.
author: Krista Sandor
